## ReadableSignal interface

This interface augments the base [Readable](./tansu.readable.md) interface by adding the ability to call the store as a function to get its value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ReadableSignal<T> extends Readable<T> 
```
**Extends:** [Readable](./tansu.readable.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
